shapes3d.utils
Class BezTubeRadius

java.lang.Object
  shapes3d.utils.BezTubeRadius
All Implemented Interfaces:
I_BezTubeRadius
public class BezTubeRadius
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_BezTubeRadius

This class is used to determine the radius of the BezTube along its length as determined by the parametric variable t.
This class is used for both flat (constant radius) and for tapered/ shaped tubes.
You can create your own class to generate the tube radius but it must implement the I_BezTubeRadius interface. Rad comments in that file for more detail.

Author:
Peter Lager
